description: Variation of Condition 2 (Approved Plans & Documents) of planning reference 2022/4518/P dated 09/05/23 for extensions and alterations of 3 - 5 Bedford Row and 3 - 5 Jockey's Fields to create additional commercial space (Class E), including erection of a setback fourth floor roof extension to the Bedford Row buildings, erection of a 3rd floor mansard roof extension and remodelled 2nd floor to the Jockey Fields buildings plus associated fenestration changes to its ground and first floors, reconstruction of the intervening link structure with two additional floors plus roof terrace above and rear closet wing extensions, plus green roofs, cycle parking, waste/recycling storage, plant and other associated works.
